theInvoker:Wex.NAME: Wex
theInvoker:Wex.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 theinvoker:Invokable Wex Orb. NL Enemies lose !M! Strength while channeled.

theInvoker:Exort.NAME: Exort
theInvoker:Exort.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 theinvoker:Invokable Exort Orb. NL Gain !M! Strength while channeled.

theInvoker:EMP.NAME: E.M.P.
theInvoker:EMP.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to all enemies.

theInvoker:HandOfMidas.NAME: Hand of Midas
theInvoker:HandOfMidas.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has !M! or less HP kill it. NL If Fatal, gain gold equal to its HP. NL Exhaust.

theInvoker:OrbOfVenom.NAME: Orb of Venom
theInvoker:OrbOfVenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy, apply !M! Poison. NL theinvoker:Combines with

theInvoker:OrbOfCorrosion.NAME: Orb of Corrosion
theInvoker:OrbOfCorrosion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy, apply !M! Poison.  Apply 8 Temporary_HP.

theInvoker:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theInvoker:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theInvoker:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theInvoker:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theInvoker:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theInvoker:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theInvoker:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theInvoker:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theInvoker:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theInvoker:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theInvoker:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theInvoker:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theInvoker:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
